SEARCH
Module com.cab302.cab302project
Package com.cab302.cab302project.model.deck

Class SqliteDeckDAO

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.cab302project.model.deck.SqliteDeckDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDeckDAO
public final class SqliteDeckDAO extends Object implements IDeckDAO
DAO implementation for managing decks in a SQLite database. Provides methods to create, update, delete, and retrieve deck data with support for soft-deletion and bookmarking features.
Author:
Andrew Clarke (a40.clarke@connect.qut.edu.au)

    • softDeleteDeck

      public void softDeleteDeck(Deck deck)
      Soft-deletes a deck by marking it as deleted in the database.

      This operation sets the is_deleted flag to true, effectively hiding the deck from regular views while keeping the record in the database for potential recovery through the recycle bin feature. It uses transactions to ensure data integrity and will roll back on failure.

      Specified by:
      softDeleteDeck in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      deck - The Deck object to be soft-deleted, must not be null and have valid ID
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if deck is null or has invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToDeleteDeckException - if database operation fails

    • restoreDeck

      public void restoreDeck(Deck deck)
      Restores a previously soft-deleted deck by marking it as not deleted.

      This operation sets the is_deleted flag to false, making the deck visible again in the application. It uses transaction management to ensure the restore process completes successfully and handles errors gracefully.

      Specified by:
      restoreDeck in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      deck - The Deck object to be restored, must not be null and have valid ID
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if deck is null or has invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToDeleteDeckException - if database operation fails

    • getDecks

      public List<Deck> getDecks(User user)
      Retrieves all decks owned by a specific user.

      This method queries the database for all decks associated with the provided user, filtering out any soft-deleted decks. It returns a list of Deck objects, each initialized with the user's information and populated from the result set.

      Specified by:
      getDecks in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The User object representing the owner whose decks are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of Deck objects owned by the specified user, excluding soft-deleted decks
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if user is null or has an invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToGetListOfDecksException - if there's a database retrieval error

    • getSoftDeletedDecks

      public List<Deck> getSoftDeletedDecks(User user)
      Retrieves all soft-deleted decks for a specific user.

      This method queries the database for decks that have been marked as deleted (is_deleted = true) and belong to the specified user. It returns a list of Deck objects representing the soft-deleted items that can be restored or permanently deleted.

      Specified by:
      getSoftDeletedDecks in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The User object whose soft-deleted decks are being retrieved
      Returns:
      List of Deck objects that have been soft-deleted and belong to the specified user
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.state.UserIsNullException - if user is null or has an invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToGetListOfDecksException - if there's a database retrieval error

    • getDeck

      public Deck getDeck(int id)
      Retrieves a specific deck by its ID.

      This method queries the database for a deck with the given ID and returns the corresponding Deck object. If no deck is found, it returns null.

      Specified by:
      getDeck in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the deck to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Deck object associated with the provided ID, or null if not found
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if the ID is invalid (less than or equal to zero)
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToGetDeckException - if database retrieval fails

    • setBookmarked

      public void setBookmarked(Deck deck, boolean bookmarked)
      Sets the bookmark status of a specific deck.

      Updates the is_bookmarked flag in the database for the given deck. This action marks the deck as either bookmarked or unbookmarked, depending on the provided boolean value. The operation is performed using an SQL UPDATE statement to ensure data consistency and integrity.

      Specified by:
      setBookmarked in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      deck - The deck whose bookmark status is being updated
      bookmarked - The new bookmark status (true for bookmarked, false otherwise)
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if the provided deck is null or has an invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToUpdateDeckException - if database operation fails

    • getBookmarkedDecks

      public List<Deck> getBookmarkedDecks(User user)
      Retrieves all decks that are currently bookmarked by a specific user.

      This method queries the database for all decks marked as bookmarked (is_bookmarked = true) and owned by the specified user. It returns them in a list of Deck objects, which can be used to display favorite or frequently accessed decks within the application interface.

      Specified by:
      getBookmarkedDecks in interface IDeckDAO
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose bookmarked decks are being retrieved
      Returns:
      List of bookmarked Deck objects belonging to the user
      Throws:
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.DeckIsNullException - if the provided user is null or has an invalid ID
      com.cab302.cab302project.error.model.deck.FailedToGetListOfDecksException - if database retrieval fails
